homepage.description.message: A bot for Discord supporting various features: checkin, remdem code, etc. for Hoyovert Game.

homepage.easyToUse.description.message: Kuma Bot is a Discord bot that is easy to use and has a lot of features.

homepage.focusOnWhatMatters.description.message: Kuma Bot is designed to be easy to use and focus on what matters. It is a Discord bot helping you to checkin and remdem code in Hoyovert Game.

homepage.powered.description.message: Kuma Bot is powered by Discord.js, a powerful library for interacting with the Discord API.
